title: Chapter 11 Hypothesis testing with randomization | Introduction to Modern Statistics
text:
Q. Test prompt for IMS
A. Test answer
exact: You may agree that there is almost always variability in data – one dataset will not be identical to a second dataset even if they are both collected from the same population using the same methods

selector.exact: You may agree that there is almost always variability in data – one dataset will not be identical to a second dataset even if they are both collected from the same population using the same methods
